verses.niv: 12 Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
verses.kjv: 12 Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
verses.esv: 12 Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation, be constant in prayer.

verses.niv: 9 Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
verses.kjv: 9 And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
verses.esv: 9 And let us not grow weary of doing good, for in due season we will reap, if we do not give up.

verses.niv: 25 But if we hope for what we do not yet have, we wait for it patiently.
verses.kjv: 25 But if we hope for that we see not, then do we with patience wait for it.
verses.esv: 25 But if we hope for what we do not see, we wait for it with patience.

verses.niv: 2 Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.
verses.kjv: 2 With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;
verses.esv: 2 with all humility and gentleness, with patience, bearing with one another in love,

verses.niv: 7 Be still before the LORD and wait patiently for him; do not fret when men succeed in their ways, when they carry out their wicked schemes. 8 Refrain from anger and turn from wrath; do not fret-it leads only to evil. 9 For evil men will be cut off, but those who hope in the LORD will inherit the land.
verses.kjv: 7 Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass. 8 Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil. 9 For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the LORD, they shall inherit the earth.
verses.esv:
7   Be still before the LORD and wait patiently for him;
    fret not yourself over the one who prospers in his way,
    over the man who carries out evil devices!
8   Refrain from anger, and forsake wrath!
    Fret not yourself; it tends only to evil.
9   For the evildoers shall be cut off,
    but those who wait for the LORD shall inherit the land.

verses.niv: 6 Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
verses.kjv: 6 Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
verses.esv: 6 do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God.

verses.niv: 4 Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
verses.kjv: 4 Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up,
verses.esv: 4 Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant

verses.niv: 31 but those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
verses.kjv: 31 But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
verses.esv:
31   but they who wait for the LORD shall renew their strength;
    they shall mount up with wings like eagles;
  they shall run and not be weary;
    they shall walk and not faint.

verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.

verses.niv: 18 A hot-tempered man stirs up dissension, but a patient man calms a quarrel.
verses.kjv: 18 A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.
verses.esv:
18   A hot-tempered man stirs up strife,
    but he who is slow to anger quiets contention.

verses.niv: 12 Therefore, as God's chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience.
verses.kjv: 12 Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
verses.esv: 12 Put on then, as Godâ€™s chosen ones, holy and beloved, compassionate hearts, kindness, humility, meekness, and patience,

verses.niv: 7 Be still before the LORD and wait patiently for him; do not fret when men succeed in their ways, when they carry out their wicked schemes.
verses.kjv: 7 Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
verses.esv:
7   Be still before the LORD and wait patiently for him;
    fret not yourself over the one who prospers in his way,
    over the man who carries out evil devices!

verses.niv: 9 Do not be quickly provoked in your spirit, for anger resides in the lap of fools.
verses.kjv: 9 Be not hasty in thy spirit to be angry: for anger resteth in the bosom of fools.
verses.esv:
9   Be not quick in your spirit to become angry,
    for anger lodges in the heart of fools.

verses.niv: 8 The end of a matter is better than its beginning, and patience is better than pride.
verses.kjv: 8 Better is the end of a thing than the beginning thereof: and the patient in spirit is better than the proud in spirit.
verses.esv:
8   Better is the end of a thing than its beginning,
    and the patient in spirit is better than the proud in spirit.

verses.niv: 19 My dear brothers, take note of this: Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry,
verses.kjv: 19 Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath:
verses.esv: 19 Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger;

verses.niv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
verses.kjv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
verses.esv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

verses.niv: 14 And we urge you, brothers, warn those who are idle, encourage the timid, help the weak, be patient with everyone.
verses.kjv: 14 Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
verses.esv: 14 And we urge you, brothers, admonish the idle, encourage the fainthearted, help the weak, be patient with them all.

verses.niv: 4 perseverance, character; and character, hope.
verses.kjv: 4 And patience, experience; and experience, hope:
verses.esv: 4 and endurance produces character, and character produces hope,

verses.niv: 36 You need to persevere so that when you have done the will of God, you will receive what he has promised.
verses.kjv: 36 For ye have need of patience, that, after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise.
verses.esv: 36 For you have need of endurance, so that when you have done the will of God you may receive what is promised.

verses.niv: 7 Be patient, then, brothers, until the Lord's coming. See how the farmer waits for the land to yield its valuable crop and how patient he is for the autumn and spring rains. 8 You too, be patient and stand firm, because the Lord's coming is near.
verses.kjv: 7 Be patient therefore, brethren, unto the coming of the Lord. Behold, the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth, and hath long patience for it, until he receive the early and latter rain. 8 Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts: for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.
verses.esv: 7 Be patient, therefore, brothers, until the coming of the Lord. See how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth, being patient about it, until it receives the early and the late rains. 8 You also, be patient. Establish your hearts, for the coming of the Lord is at hand.

verses.niv: 9 The Lord is not slow in keeping his promise, as some understand slowness. He is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish, but everyone to come to repentance.
verses.kjv: 9 The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
verses.esv: 9 The Lord is not slow to fulfill his promise as some count slowness, but is patient toward you, not wishing that any should perish, but that all should reach repentance.

verses.niv: 1 I waited patiently for the LORD; he turned to me and heard my cry.
verses.kjv: 1 I waited patiently for the LORD; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.
verses.esv:
To the choirmaster. A Psalm of David.

40:1   I waited patiently for the LORD;
    he inclined to me and heard my cry.

verses.niv: 5 May the God who gives endurance and encouragement give you a spirit of unity among yourselves as you follow Christ Jesus,
verses.kjv: 5 Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus:
verses.esv: 5 May the God of endurance and encouragement grant you to live in such harmony with one another, in accord with Christ Jesus,

verses.niv: 16 But for that very reason I was shown mercy so that in me, the worst of sinners, Christ Jesus might display his unlimited patience as an example for those who would believe on him and receive eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.
verses.esv: 16 But I received mercy for this reason, that in me, as the foremost, Jesus Christ might display his perfect patience as an example to those who were to believe in him for eternal life.

verses.niv: 11 being strengthened with all power according to his glorious might so that you may have great endurance and patience, and joyfully
verses.kjv: 11 Strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;
verses.esv: 11 being strengthened with all power, according to his glorious might, for all endurance and patience with joy;
